downloadTitle: Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 Hyper-V Common Criteria Security Target
downloadDescription: Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 Hyper-V Common Criteria Security Target
detailsSection:
This document is the Security Target for the Common Criteria evaluation of the Microsoft Server 2008 R2 Hyper-V RTM virtualization product. It is conformant to the Common Criteria for Information Technology Security Evaluation Version 3.1 Release 3[CC].

The Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 Hyper-V Common Criteria Security Target is primarily for IT professionals, security specialists, network architects, computer engineers, and other IT consultants who plan application or infrastructure development and deployments of Windows Server 2008 R2 Hyper-V in an enterprise environment. It is not intended for home users.
systemRequirementsSection:
Product: Microsoft Hyper-V Server 2008 R2 (6.1.7600)
Language: English
Underlying processors: Hardware-assisted virtualization.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download.
2. Do one of the following:
a. To read the file immediately, click the Open button.
b. To copy the file to your computer for later use, click the Save button.
